sqlMap.select: select content from t_announce t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1 and t.starttime<UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) and t.endtime>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) limit 1
select id,title from t_message t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1 and t.publishtime>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 day)) order by t.publishtime desc

select id,title,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d') publishtime from t_news t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1 and t.publishtime>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 day)) order by t.publishtime desc
select name,url from t_link a where a.isvalid=1 order by a.sort
select id,title,content,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishtime from t_message t where t.id=#id#
select count(id) cnt from t_message t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1
select id,title,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d') publishtime from t_message t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1 order by t.publishtime desc limit $firstRow$,$listRows$
select count(id) cnt from t_news t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1
select id,title,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d') publishtime from t_news t where t.isvalid=1 and t.ispublish=1 order by t.publishtime desc limit $firstRow$,$listRows$
select id,title,color,author,description,content,DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(publishtime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') publishtime from t_news t where t.id=#id#
